help_document.overview: Please Report any Bugs Found within the Affy SBEAMS pages via the on-line bug tracking software called Mantis

summary.name: Report a Bug
summary.description: There is no need to log in. Just click the following link and follow the instructions

all_steps.step: Choose the most appropriate 'Category'. If the bug is specific to the Affy pages please use Microarray
Select the 'Reproducibility' option to indicate how often the bug appears
Give a quick description on what the problem is and how you encountered the problem
